thread.title: Win £150 in Shell V-Power Nitro+ fuel vouchers
thread.title_full: Win £150 in Shell V-Power Nitro+ fuel vouchers - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win £150 in Shell V-Power Nitro+ fuel vouchers
text: There are lots of ways to love your car . You might be a Sunday servicer – cleaning, polishing and fixing your pride and joy with religious devotion. You might be a track-day pro, pushing the redline on the racing circuit. You might be a technical tweaker, squeezing every bit of on-the-road performance out of its drivetrain. You might be a canny investor, loving your car for the way it makes you money. Everyone who loves their car ought to use a premium fuel. Over time, non-premium diesel can leave harmful gunky deposits on the fuel injectors. Eventually, this may rob the engine of its best performance. Shell V-Power Nitro+Diesel is formulated with powerful cleaning agents designed to prevent and remove this gunk. It is also designed to form a protective film on metal surfaces, which decreases the corrosion rate. This helps to protect precision fuel-system components. To win £150 in Shell V-Power Nitro+ fuel vouchers, fill in the form below and reveal how you love your car – if you think you've got a better way of displaying the affection you have for your motor, you can also enter the Telegraph's Twitter competition and reveal all in no more than 140 characters using the hashtag #shellvpower and the handle @ShellStationsUK You can enter each weekly draw both via Twitter and the form below, but only one entry per person. A draw will be made each week from now until midnight on 4 February 2016. Plenty of chances for you to win. • To find out more about Shell V-Power Nitro+ Diesel and to find your nearest station, visit shell.co.uk Online Form - Win £150 in Shell V-Power Nitro+ fuel vouchers
